article_node.title: Daryl Hall and John Oates quietly resolve lawsuit over sale of joint venture. What to know
article_node.summary: Daryl Hall and John Oates settled their business dispute over the sale of a stake in their joint venture, Whole Oats Enterprises, through arbitration, leading Hall to dismiss his lawsuit without prejudice on August 11. The case had earlier seen a temporary restraining order blocking Oates’ planned sale to Primary Wave Music, pending an arbitrator’s decision. Hall accused Oates of a ‘partnership betrayal’ by attempting to sell without Hall’s written approval, while Oates countered that Hall’s claims were ‘inflammatory and inaccurate.’ The settlement leaves the sale’s outcome unclear, but the parties are no longer in court and may potentially refile the issue later.}
